Flub.Name: Standard
Flub.Description: Displacement on the horizontal (X) and vertical (Y) axes.

Flub.Name: Vertical
Flub.Description: Altitude displacement on the height (Z) axis.

Flub.Name: Rugged
Flub.Description: Strong displacement on the horizontal (X) and vertical (Y) axes.

Flub.Name: Uniform
Flub.Description: When enabled, the Strength slider's value applies to both the horizontal (X) and vertical (Y) axes.

Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: The strength of the displacement. When Uniform is turned off, this controls the displacement for the horizontal (X) axis.

Flub.Name: Strength Vertical
Flub.Description: Available when Uniform is turned Off This controls the displacement for the vertical (Y) axis.

Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the internal noise.

Flub.Name: Complexity
Flub.Description: The complexity (octaves) of the internal noise.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.

Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: Number of times the displacement is applied repeatedly. This can help create more elaborate displacement effects.

Flub.Name: High Quality
Flub.Description: When enabled, higher quality displacement is used to prevent directional stretching. This may take longer to process.
